definitions.text: a binding agreement between two or more persons that is enforceable by law
(contract bridge) the highest bid becomes the contract setting the number of tricks that the bidder must make
a variety of bridge in which the bidder receives points toward game only for the number of tricks he bid

examples: They signed two new pitchers for the next season

definitions.text: be stricken by an illness, fall victim to an illness

examples: The heat contracted the woollen garment
Congress condensed the three-year plan into a six-month plan

definitions.text: make or become more narrow or restricted
reduce in scope while retaining essential elements
